short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 1 in 50 chance of a new tab opening up the glory of John Cena

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cenafy for Chrome provides a 2% chance of displaying John Cena's theme every time a new tab is opened. This is a great extension for fans or anyone looking for some random fun.

Get Cenafy Pro to select how often Cena appears:
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/cenafy-pro/nemoahpekkghjdlmhiapdnkjfngdhhpa?hl=en-US
